tool_description: Apply the Bokeh effect (with image processing) a visually pleasing blur to an image, while also having the option to specify the shape of the lens aperture. This allows for customized and creative effects on the resulting image, providing aesthetic enhancements with various aperture shapes.
name: Bokeh effect filter
title: Bokeh effect filter

api_list.name: Viewer
api_list.description:
A simple HTML webpage to:

- view images with base64 string source

- generate the base64 string from an image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bokeh-effect-filter.p.rapidapi.com/viewer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bokeh-effect-filter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://bokeh-effect-filter.p.rapidapi.com/viewer"
